Title: TypedMVVM - Simple MVVM for TypeScript, Cordova and Universal Windows apps
Description: TypedMVVM is a collection of samples and libraries for using TypeScript and MVVM with Cordova, Windows Store and Universal apps.
HomeWiki: TypedMVVM is a collection of samples and libraries for writing Apache Cordova multi-platform (iOS, Android, Windows, Windows Phone) and Universal Windows apps (targeting Windows Store, Windows Phone 8.1 and Xbox One) using WinJS, TypeScript and MVVM.
